text: (napiye! Umakku kattuppatukiravarkalaip pola pavanai ceytu nir kuruvataik ketka) umakku cevi cayppavarkalum avarkalil untu. Eninum, avarkal (tam tiyac ceyalkalin karanamaka) atai vilankik kollatirukkumpati avarkalutaiya ullankalil tiraiyaiyum avarkalutaiya katukalil cevittaiyum nam erpatuttivittom. Akave, (ivarkal cattiyattirkuriya) attatcikal anaittaiyum (telivakak) kantapotilum avarrai avarkal (oru ciritum) nampave mattarkal. (Napiye!)
